arts.ttl: Player Ratings Poll: Gladbach 0 - 1 Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Bayern Munich claimed an important 1-0 win over Borussia Mönchengladbach on Saturday in its return to Bundesliga action. Be sure to stay tuned to Bavarian Podcast Works for all of your up to date coverage on Bayern Munich and Germany.

arts.ttl: Sporting success — a key factor for Joshua Kimmich and Bayern Munich contract talks
arts.sum: Upon being questioned whether the extensions of players like Jamal Musiala and Alphonso Davies would play a role “Of course it’s also about how the team will look like in the coming years to be successful. Bayern Munich ’s Joshua Kimmich revealed the key reasons that his contract extension will be centered around.

arts.ttl: Match Awards from Bayern’s nervously narrow 1-0 victory over Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Kimmich accumulated a match-high 0.91 xA (expected assists), with the nearest opportunity coming from a ball to Thomas Müller who almost found the back of the net if not for a stellar Moritz Nicolas in goal ( FotMob ). On top of this, the Englishman came close to scoring his first goal in a non-friendly match for Bayern, as he did well to head a Michael Olise corner in the right direction early in the first half.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich coach Vincent Kompany credits team’s resolve in 1-0 win over Gladbach
arts.sum: Despite his team always appearing to be in control of the match, Bayern Munich boss Vincent Kompany was likely not very comfortable during the squad’s 1-0 victory over Borussia Mönchengladbach. We should’ve scored a second and decided the game earlier but we didn’t.

arts.ttl: Harry Kane keen for Bayer Leverkusen title battle
arts.sum: Bayern Munich's match winner against Borussia Mönchengladbach, Harry Kane, said the Bavarian giants are ready to go toe to toe with defending Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen as this season's title battle takes shape. For Kane's coach, Kompany, Saturday's win - Bayern's 12th in 16 Bundesliga games in 2024/25 - highlighted the strong mentality his side are currently playing with.

arts.ttl: Kimmich opens up on his contract talks with Bayern
arts.sum: After Bayern's 1-0 win over Gladbach, Joshua Kimmich spoke about the possibility of extending his expiring contract with Bayern München.

arts.ttl: Bavarian Podcast Works: Postgame Show — Gladbach 0-1 Bayern Munich (Bundesliga)
arts.sum: Bayern Munich got off to a good start in the second half of the season with this win... Gladbach came out with far more intensity in the second half and Bayern Munich struggled to deal with it.

arts.ttl: Three observations as Bayern Munich scrape past Borussia Mönchengladbach 1-0
arts.sum: The play went where Kimmich was as he floated into those right-half spaces he knows so well to provide those effortless through balls and crosses: and suddenly, Bayern was on the verge of scoring again. Konrad Laimer and Kimmich overlapping in the first half were great and Bayern constricted Gladbach to their 4-4-2/4-4-3 out-of-possession structure during buildup and to their 5-at-the-bach (haha!) in the final third.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola confirms Kyle Walker wants to LEAVE Man City this month
arts.sum: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has confirmed Kyle Walker was left out of the squad to face Salford City in order to push for a transfer exit during the January window

arts.ttl: Harry Kane penalty edges Bayern Munich past resilient Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Bayern Munich maintained their four-point lead at the top of the Bundesliga with a hard-fought 1-0 victory over Borussia Mönchengladbach, Harry Kane's second-half penalty settling an absorbing encounter at Borussia-Park. MOENCHENGLADBACH, GERMANY - JANUARY 11: Harry Kane of Bayern Munich celebrates scoring his team's first goal from a penalty kick during the Bundesliga match between Borussia Mönchengladbach and FC Bayern München at Borussia-Park on January 11, 2025 in Moenchengladbach, Germany.
